content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSVCDVER
      operator: non_empty
    - name: TSVCDREF
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000153
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when TSVCDVER is populated and TSVCDREF is null
Outcome:
  Message: TSVCDREF is null when TSVCDVER is populated
  Output Variables:
    - TSVCDVER
    - TSVCDREF
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0266
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The version number of the Reference Terminology, if
                  applicable.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: Trigger error when TSVCDVER is populated and TSVCDREF is null

Outcome.Message: TSVCDREF is null when TSVCDVER is populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The version number of the Reference Terminology, if applicable.
